title: BACKUP & RESTORE all application from PRODUCTION to PROD-LIKE and TEST

task_list.instruction_title:
On   **29.08.2025**
proceed with  **PRD Back ups for All standard applications**
On **PROD LIKE**: **RESTORE** all applications based on  **PRODUCTION **backup made on step 1 - **Between 27th and 29th of August**
On **TEST**: **RESTORE ****SECLI **and **ATLAS **based on **PRODUCTION **Backup made on step 1 - **On the 26th and 27th of August**
